players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated her last night. She's the mafioso."
You: "I'm with Diana. Alice was our first victim and Charlie is suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves he is mafia. Vote Charlie to save the town."
Charlie: "Diana is the real mafioso. My investigation clearly showed she's mafia. Don't be fooled by her lies."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
